name: ufilfil
body: |- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)))

stmt.origin: simplbi(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), wral(hs0, cpw(c1), wo(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cdif(c1, cv(hs0)), c0))))
stmt.pretty: simplbi(c0 ∈(UFil ` c1), c0 ∈(Fil ` c1), ∀(hs0 ∈ P(c1),(hs0 ∈ c0 ∨(c1 \ hs0)∈ c0)))
